title: Principles of Dynamics
description: In-depth analysis of dynamics principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Principles of Design
description: Interdisciplinary approach to design combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Ethics
description: In-depth analysis of ethics principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Design
description: Interdisciplinary approach to design combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Advanced Dynamics
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of dynamics. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Dynamics
description: In-depth analysis of dynamics principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Analysis
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of analysis. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Advanced Materials
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in materials. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Advanced Dynamics
description: Comprehensive study of dynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: MECH 384 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Optimization
description: Rigorous treatment of optimization theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Graduate Controls
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of controls. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: MECH 302 and senior standing or graduate status
